      • intersectsWith

        public static boolean intersectsWith(Cat cat,
                                     java.lang.Object o)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        This method checks if the given Cat object intersects with the given object.
        Parameters:
        cat - The given Cat object.
        o - The object to be checked intersection with the Cat object.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Cat object intersects with the other given object, returns false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
